newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - TVS Suzuki started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - TVS Suzuki started as buy.

text.p: -- Caspian Securities said Thursday it had started coverage of Indian motorcycle maker TVS Suzuki Ltd with a rating of buy.
-- Analyst Rakesh Parekh wrote in a report he had started coverage of the stock at a price of 337.75 rupees, or $9.43, a share.

-- "We believe TVS' growing volumes, strong southern-based infrastructure support, brand equity and expected higher penetration levels in national markets will continue to drive further outperformance in the stock," he said.
-- He set a 12-month price target of 450 rupees, representing a total return of 34.1 percent including a dividend yield of 0.89 percent.
